data.fullContent: Let me tell you about last night at the supermarket. Two boys tried to steal some beer and run off the back door. They were caught before they had even left the store, and the police came and took them away. It was a lot of excitement for a Thursday night at the grocery store!
data.answer: 让我告诉你昨晚在超市的事。两个男孩试图偷一些啤酒然后从后门逃跑。他们还没离开商店就被抓住了，警察就来把他们带走了。周四晚上在杂货店里真是太兴奋了!
